author: Vincenzo Errico
description: This Manhattan-like cocktail is rightly recognised as being a contemporary classic cocktail. Also great served on-the-rocks in an old-fashioned glass.
name: Red Hook
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
